org.springdata.cassandra.cql.core

Interface CqlOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CqlTemplate

    public interface CqlOperations
    Operations for interacting with Cassandra at the lowest level. This interface provides Exception Translation.
    Author:
    Alex Shvid, David Webb, Matthew Adams

      • process

        void process(com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet resultSet,
           RowCallbackHandler rch)
        Processes the ResultSet through the RowCallbackHandler and return nothing. This is used internal to the Template for core operations, but is made available through Operations in the event you have a ResultSet to process. The ResultsSet could come from a ResultSetFuture after an asynchronous query.
        Parameters:
        resultSet - Results to process
        rch - RowCallbackHandler with the processing implementation

      • process

        <T> List<T> process(com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet resultSet,
                  RowMapper<T> rowMapper)
        Processes the ResultSet through the RowMapper and returns the List of mapped Rows. This is used internal to the Template for core operations, but is made available through Operations in the event you have a ResultSet to process. The ResultsSet could come from a ResultSetFuture after an asynchronous query.
        Parameters:
        resultSet - Results to process
        rowMapper - RowMapper with the processing implementation
        Returns:
        List of generated by the RowMapper

      • processOne

        <T> T processOne(com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet resultSet,
               RowMapper<T> rowMapper,
               boolean singleResult)
        Process a ResultSet through a RowMapper. This is used internal to the Template for core operations, but is made available through Operations in the event you have a ResultSet to process. The ResultsSet could come from a ResultSetFuture after an asynchronous query.
        Parameters:
        resultSet -
        rowMapper -
        singleResult - Expected single result
        Returns:

      • processOneFirstColumn

        <T> T processOneFirstColumn(com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet resultSet,
                          Class<T> elementType,
                          boolean singleResult)
        Process a ResultSet, trying to convert the first columns of the first Row to Class. This is used internal to the Template for core operations, but is made available through Operations in the event you have a ResultSet to process. The ResultsSet could come from a ResultSetFuture after an asynchronous query.
        Parameters:
        resultSet -
        elementType -
        singleResult - Expected single result
        Returns:

      • processOneAsMap

        Map<String,Object> processOneAsMap(com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet resultSet,
                                 boolean singleResult)
        Process a ResultSet with ONE Row and convert to a Map. This is used internal to the Template for core operations, but is made available through Operations in the event you have a ResultSet to process. The ResultsSet could come from a ResultSetFuture after an asynchronous query.
        Parameters:
        resultSet -
        singleResult - Expected single result
        Returns:

      • processFirstColumn

        <T> List<T> processFirstColumn(com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet resultSet,
                             Class<T> elementType)
        Process a ResultSet and convert the first column of the results to a List. This is used internal to the Template for core operations, but is made available through Operations in the event you have a ResultSet to process. The ResultsSet could come from a ResultSetFuture after an asynchronous query.
        Parameters:
        resultSet -
        elementType -
        Returns:

      • processAsMap

        List<Map<String,Object>> processAsMap(com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet resultSet)
        Process a ResultSet and convert it to a List of Maps with column/value. This is used internal to the Template for core operations, but is made available through Operations in the event you have a ResultSet to process. The ResultsSet could come from a ResultSetFuture after an asynchronous query.
        Parameters:
        resultSet -
        Returns:

      • prepareStatement

        com.datastax.driver.core.PreparedStatement prepareStatement(String cql)
        Converts the CQL provided into a SimplePreparedStatementCreator. This can only be used for CQL Statements that do not have data binding.
        Parameters:
        cql - The CQL Statement to prepare
        Returns:
        PreparedStatement

      • prepareStatement

        com.datastax.driver.core.PreparedStatement prepareStatement(PreparedStatementCreator psc)
        Uses the provided PreparedStatementCreator to prepare a new PreparedSession
        Parameters:
        psc - The implementation to create the PreparedStatement
        Returns:
        PreparedStatement

      • execute

        <T> T execute(com.datastax.driver.core.PreparedStatement ps,
            PreparedStatementCallback<T> psc)
        Executes the prepared statement and processes the statement using the provided Callback. This can only be used for CQL Statements that do not have data binding. The results of the PreparedStatement are processed with PreparedStatementCallback implementation provided by the Application Code.
        Parameters:
        ps - The implementation to create the PreparedStatement
        psc - What to do with the results of the PreparedStatement
        Returns:
        Type as determined by the supplied Callback.

        Binds prepared statement
        Parameters:
        ps - The PreparedStatement
        Returns:

                                           PreparedStatementBinder psb)
        Binds prepared statement
        Parameters:
        ps - The PreparedStatement
        psb - The implementation to bind variables to values if exists
        Returns:

      • describeRing

        List<RingMember> describeRing()
        Describe the current Ring. This uses the provided RingMemberHostMapper to provide the basics of the Cassandra Ring topology.
        Returns:
        The collection of ring tokens that are active in the cluster

      • describeRing

        <T> List<T> describeRing(HostMapper<T> hostMapper)
        Describe the current Ring. Application code must provide its own HostMapper implementation to process the lists of hosts returned by the Cassandra Cluster Metadata.
        Parameters:
        hostMapper - The implementation to use for host mapping.
        Returns:
        Collection generated by the provided HostMapper.

      • getSession

        com.datastax.driver.core.Session getSession()
        Get the current Session used for operations in the implementing class.
        Returns:
        The DataStax Driver Session Object

      • ingest

        IngestOperation ingest(com.datastax.driver.core.PreparedStatement ps,
                     Iterable<Object[]> rows)
        This is an operation designed for high performance writes. The cql is used to create a PreparedStatement once, then all row values are bound to the single PreparedStatement and executed against the Session.

        This is used internally by the other ingest() methods, but can be used if you want to write your own RowIterator. The Object[] length returned by the next() implementation must match the number of bind variables in the CQL.

        Parameters:
        asynchronously - Do asynchronously or not
        ps - The PreparedStatement
        rows - Implementation to provide the Object[] to be bound to the CQL.

      • ingest

        IngestOperation ingest(com.datastax.driver.core.PreparedStatement ps,
                     Object[][] rows)
        This is an operation designed for high performance writes. The cql is used to create a PreparedStatement once, then all row values are bound to the single PreparedStatement and executed against the Session.

        The Object[] length of the nested array must match the number of bind variables in the CQL.

        Parameters:
        asynchronously - Do asynchronously or not
        ps - The PreparedStatement
        rows - Object array of Object array of values to bind to the CQL.
